actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide a graduated exemption from the public pension offset applicable to certain monthly insurance benefits under such title based on the amount of total monthly benefits received.
short_title: Social Security Public Pension Offset Amendments Act of 1989
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Public Pension Offset Amendments Act of 1989 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to reduce the proportion of monthly Federal or State pension benefits subtracted from monthly OASDI benefits payable to a spouse, surviving spouse, or parent as the total of such monthly benefits diminishes.

titles.title: Social Security Public Pension Offset Amendments Act of 1989

To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide a graduated exemption from the public pension offset applicable to certain monthly insurance benefits under such title based on the amount of total monthly benefits received.
